description.value:
Allows user to exude an unseen chemical gas through modified sweat glands with a +20 Willpower Test. If successful Charm Tests gain +10 Bonus, rising to +20 if in an enclosed area with little or no strong air movement.

Requirements

Those in sealed armour or suits may be immune to this.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -
